A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rey becomes even more boring and the ultimate Mary Sue in this movie. Kylo Ren is as whiny and boring as ever. Finn goes from being somewhat useless to completely useless...and boring. Poe was meh. Rian Johnson took the only redeemable aspects from TFA and tossed them aside for lazy writing and characterizations that were completely off - See his take on Luke.
